basics.name: Punit Mishra
basics.title: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 12+ years of experience architecting and building production systems at scale. Deep expertise in AI/ML infrastructure, distributed systems, and full-stack development. Track record of delivering high-impact projects from concept to production serving enterprise customers globally.

experience.summary: Lead architect for AI/ML infrastructure serving Fortune 500 enterprise customers globally.
highlights: Architected and built core enterprise platform from v0 to production, now serving Fortune 500 customers with millions of daily requests
Led AI/ML infrastructure development including LLM integration, vector search (FAISS), and multi-agent systems using LangGraph
Pioneered ML containerization strategy 3 years before industry adoption of MLOps practices
Achieved 40% latency reduction and 3x throughput improvement through distributed caching and query optimization
Reduced cloud infrastructure costs by $500K+ annually through resource optimization and intelligent autoscaling
Technical lead for cross-functional teams of 5-8 engineers; mentored 10+ engineers across multiple teams
Led SOC 2 compliance initiatives and implemented zero-trust security architecture

experience.summary: Building production-grade IoT systems, embedded controllers, and network infrastructure for home automation and personal projects.
highlights: Built Railroad Arcade: remote-controlled model railroad with Next.js, WebSockets, and Raspberry Pi GPIO for real-time control
Developed Shield AI: high-performance DNS security system in Rust with ML-based threat detection, sub-millisecond latency
Created Circuit Playground Express controller with CircuitPython for embedded train control, open-sourced for maker community
Designed and deployed homelab with 5 Raspberry Pis: DNS filtering, media server, monitoring, IoT bridge, and sensor nodes
Implemented Pi-hole alternative with custom ML models for DGA detection and real-time threat analysis
Built automated deployment pipeline with GitHub Actions, Docker multi-arch builds, and Cloudflare Tunnels
Coursework: Artificial Intelligence, Computer Architecture, Communication Networks, Signals & Systems

projects.name: Shield AI
projects.description: AI-powered DNS filtering system with real-time threat detection using Rust and ML. Sub-millisecond latency, 15MB memory, DGA detection.

projects.name: Railroad Arcade
projects.description: Remote-controlled model railroad web app with real-time IoT control, game modes, and leaderboards using Next.js and Raspberry Pi.

projects.name: Circuit Playground Express Controller
projects.description: Open-source CircuitPython firmware for embedded model railroad control with smooth acceleration and sensor feedback.

projects.name: Raspberry Pi Homelab
projects.description: Fleet of 5 Raspberry Pis providing DNS security, IoT control, media serving, monitoring, and sensor collection.

projects.name: Grepcoin ($GREP)
projects.description: Developer-focused cryptocurrency with utility for code search APIs. ERC-20 token with staking, governance, and DeFi integration.

projects.name: Multi-Agent AI System
projects.description: Orchestrated AI agents for complex task automation using LangGraph with state management and error recovery.
